channel.title: Client Error! Help please
channel.description:
Hello, Thanks for trying to help me. I jared and signed my server with JarMaker and uploaded the .jar file to DropBox in the Public Folder now I put the webclient online with following code:
[code=javascript]<applet name="RuneAssault" width="765" height="503" archive="http://dl.dropbox.com/u/67790145/client.jar" code="client.class"> <param name="java_arguments" value="-Xmx1024m"> </applet>[/code]
Now when I start the website it won't load and my Internet freezes. If you don't know what I mean you can try to open the sire yourself: http://runeassault.weebly.com/webclient.html
Please I need a solution it would be realy nice if someone can help me, Kind regards: RuneAssault

item.title: Client Error! Help please
item.dc:creator: @RuneAssault RuneAssault
item.description:
@RuneAssault wrote:

Thanks for trying to help me!
I tried to change to value up and also to change it down. It all didn’t help if someone have another suggestion I would like to hear it please.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Error! Help please
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Tutorial, post:3, topic:436811”][quote author=Ruby Forums Coder link=topic=539525.msg3948803#msg3948803 date=1332106192]
The only thing I can think of is that maybe the value is too low, make it larger :).
[/quote]
Making it too high leads to the possibility of your PC performance slowing greatly and also causes memory leaks.[/quote]

It’s obvious I’m not a java programmer haha, I barely know anything. But that’s the only thing that I think could be wrong with it, the html stuff looks perfect.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Error! Help please
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

Ruby Forums Coder:

The only thing I can think of is that maybe the value is too low, make it larger :).

Making it too high leads to the possibility of your PC performance slowing greatly and also causes memory leaks.

Read full topic
